data.prayer: Spirit, help the 57,766 believers in Ouémé to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ouémé, Benin
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Ouémé, Benin.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Ouémé, Benin to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Ouémé, Benin to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Foodo people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Foodo people know you.
Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Ouémé, Benin so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 57,766 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Ouémé.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 773,400 people living in Ouémé through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

location.name: Ouémé
location.people_groups_list: Cabe, Mbelime, Watchi, Gbe, Toli, Songhai-Koyraboro
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Cabe (3,100), Mbelime (2,700), Watchi (61,000), Gbe, Toli (11,000), Songhai-Koyraboro (9,000)
